title: i am glad irelia is losing her scaling magic damage ad passive
body:
good job riot.
keep up the good work.

replies.body:
If they removed Irelias disarm, then following must be removed:

Rengar's passive extra AD of every champ
Ornn's items upgrades
And other overloaded shit which grants extra bonuses for the champs.

its more of its ok "how rengar gets AD of his passive" due to his glory of killing in his conquest. while irelia is a champion made to fight armies at a time due to her disarm/shielding/shield busting. now they are pulling the NOPE button on her even though it shouldnt happen in any universe due to it breaching her identity like it killed galios superhero identity.

yup they want to gut and lie/change about a champs identity even though thats their job to do that thing. way to kill off unique cc on her next stop ornns brittle and hey why not remove ornns passive while we are at it. thats where we are headed.
